entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with rain changing to rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 40 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
